fullplot: The Bakers, a family of 14, move from small-town Illinois to the big city after Tom Baker gets his dream job to coach his alma mater's football team. Meanwhile, his wife also gets her dream of getting her book published. While she's away promoting the book, Tom has a hard time keeping the house in order while at the same time coaching his football team, as the once happy family starts falling apart.
plot: With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.
title: Cheaper by the Dozen

tomatoes.consensus: In this family of twelve children, much chaos ensues, but little hilarity.
